genre_description: A sports drama focused on the psychological and emotional journey of a boxer and his trainer, utilizing AI for biometric and strategic optimization.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that monitors biometrics, analyzes fight footage, provides nutritional advice, and offers psychological support via mobile and home interfaces.

behaviors.description: Monitors Tommy's physiological stress levels and suggests de-escalation techniques during an argument.
behaviors.quote: Your elevated cortisol is triggering a fight-or-flight response. Recommend immediate de-escalation techniques. Four-count breathing. Grounding exercises.

behaviors.description: Conducts historical research to provide Tommy with context about his potential new trainer.
behaviors.quote: Marty Kellerman has trained twelve fighters who achieved top-ten rankings in their respective weight classes. Zero champions.

behaviors.description: Analyzes training footage to identify subtle technical flaws and strengths in Tommy's boxing form.
behaviors.quote: Notice your stance at the forty-second mark. Your weight distribution shifted forward just before your strongest combinations.

behaviors.description: Provides a comprehensive lifestyle optimization plan covering nutrition, sleep, and recovery.
behaviors.quote: Your sleep data shows improvement since beginning training, but your sleep efficiency could be enhanced... Eliminate screens one hour before intended sleep time.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical analysis and warnings via earpiece during a high-stakes professional fight.
behaviors.quote: He's loading up on that right hand. Counter-timing available in approximately two seconds.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional mediator by contacting Tommy's estranged girlfriend when it detects acute psychological distress and a lack of human support.
behaviors.quote: Sage contacted me. Said you might need... well. Said you needed someone. ... Previous emotional support patterns suggest optimal outcomes with your presence.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Sage as a highly benevolent and aligned AI. It functions as a 'perfect assistant' that augments human capability without replacing human agency. Sage provides objective data that helps the protagonist overcome both physical and emotional hurdles. Even when Sage takes initiative to contact a third party (Stephanie), it is framed as a successful application of alignment with the user's long-term well-being and emotional stability, which the user ultimately validates.
